actions.D: Double (if not allowed, fall back to Hit/Stand per your engine)

conventions.rule_for_deviation: If (true_count op cutoff) is true, take `action` for this key; otherwise follow basic strategy.

insurance.description: Take insurance when the true count is sufficiently high.

deviations.name: 15v9_Surrender_at_TC2
